Package br.com.concepting.framework.util

Class NumberUtil

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.util.NumberUtil
public class NumberUtil extends Object
Class responsible to manipulate numbers.

    • parse

      public static <N extends Number> N parse(Class<?> clazz, String value, boolean useGroupSeparator, int precision) throws ParseException
      Converts a string into a numeric value.
      Type Parameters:
      N - Class that defines the numeric value.
      Parameters:
      clazz - Class that defines the numeric value.
      value - String that contains the numeric value.
      useGroupSeparator - Indicates if the number group separator should be considered.
      precision - Numeric value that contains the decimal precision.
      Returns:
      String that contains the formatted numeric value.
      Throws:
      ParseException - Occurs when was not possible to execute the operation.
